            "title": [["Checking if a number is a power of 2"]]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "page",
          "version": 9

      "c729b5c4-288e-4d67-968f-5dcf4ac3a97c": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1550461185216,
          "id": "c729b5c4-288e-4d67-968f-5dcf4ac3a97c",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1550461185216,
          "parent_id": "c156fcd4-1e9e-4665-b718-92f7d4857842",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["If an integer "],
              ["x", [["c"]]],
              [" is a power of 2, only one bit is set, whereas "],
              ["x-1", [["c"]]],
              [" has all bits set after that. For example: "],
              ["4", [["c"]]],
              [" is "],
              ["100", [["c"]]],
              [" and "],
              ["3", [["c"]]],
              [" is "],
              ["011", [["c"]]],
              [
                " as binary number, which satisfies the aforementioned condition. Zero is not a power of 2 and has to be checked explicitly."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
      "c9d8dfc6-bfed-4e69-a662-a44eac1c0350": {

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["So, in order to do this, we know that "],
              ["READ", [["b"]]],
              [" is placed 8 bits behind, "],
              ["WRITE", [["b"]]],
              [" is placed 4 bits behind and "],
              ["PERMISSIONS", [["b"]]],
              [" is placed at the last. The number system being used for "],
              ["RESOURCE", [["b"]]],
              [
                " permissions is actually 12 bit (in our example). It can(will) be different in different systems."
              ]
            ]
          },

          "alive": true,

            "title": [
              ["So, this is how we can get the "],
